title: Machine
description: Product DescriptionIn an outlandish world, Reece discovers that her wings are being crushed by the labor she performs every day. But before her wings are entirely useless, she runs away, only to find that she knows nowhere else to run to.The second novel by Ronan Gallagher. A picaresque journey that follows Reece and Balzac, who meet in a gigantic maze of stacked books and explore the machinations of their world.http://www.amazon.com/Machine-ebook/d...
author: Ronan Gallagher
